sentences.en: At first I really didn'tcare whether he came or not.
sentences.cn: 起先我真的不在乎他是否会来。

sentences.en: He could not tell whether the floor was wood or stone.
sentences.cn: 他无法确定地板是木头的还是石头的。

sentences.en: I couldn't decide whether he was incredibly brave or just insane.
sentences.cn: 我不能判定他到底是英勇无畏还是精神失常。

sentences.en: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.cn: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.en: It is questionable whether the expenditure on this project is really justified.
sentences.cn: 该项目的开支是否真的合理还未可知。

sentences.en: It isn't clear whether the plane went down over land or sea.
sentences.cn: 不清楚飞机是坠毁在陆地上还是海里。

sentences.en: It remains to be seen whether her parliamentary colleagues will agree.
sentences.cn: 她的国会同僚是否同意，现在还无从知晓。

sentences.en: It was touch and go whether we'd go bankrupt.
sentences.cn: 我们是否会破产还很难说。

sentences.en: It's not a case of whether anyone would notice or not.
sentences.cn: 这不是会不会有人注意到的问题。

sentences.en: Look, Kate, I’m calling the doctor, whether you like it or not.
sentences.cn: 喂，凯特，我要打电话叫医生来，不管你愿不愿意。

sentences.en: Maurice asked me whether I needed any help.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.en: One of the journalists queried whether sabotage could have been involved.
sentences.cn: 其中一位新闻记者询问是否有人为破坏的可能性。

sentences.en: The jury is out on whether or not this is true.
sentences.cn: 这是否属实仍未得出定论。

sentences.en: The key issue was whether the four defendants acted dishonestly.
sentences.cn: 关键问题是4名被告是否存在欺诈行为。

sentences.en: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.cn: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

sentences.en: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.cn: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.en: To this day, it's unclear whether he shot himself or was murdered.
sentences.cn: 至今尚不清楚他究竟是饮弹自杀还是被谋杀。

sentences.en: West had to decide whether to play a heart.
sentences.cn: 韦斯特必须决定是否要出一张红桃。

sentences.en: What determines whether you are a career success or a failure?
sentences.cn: 事业的成败取决于哪些因素？

sentences.en: Whether such properties are a good deal will depend on individual situations.
sentences.cn: 这样的地产是否可获得大笔收益还要视具体情形而定。

trans.tran_cn: (表示选择或怀疑)是否，无论，不管
trans.tran_en: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain
